purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the information needed to describe explicit geometric models and transformations used in the design process for an electronic assembly. This module permits a different type of geometric representation for a component in a library and for an instance of the component in the design.

inscope.li: three dimensional shape properties of assemblies

outscope.li: two dimensional shape properties of assemblies
